Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Methodologies: Analysis and evaluation of blood glucose results
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoManager Data Management Software, an RS232-based accessory for managing glucose meter data.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for home and clinical use to aid people with diabetes and health care professionals in reviewing, analyzing, and evaluating blood glucose test results to support diabetes management; not intended for diagnostic purposes.
